title: Implement mock KG (HardState and Relationship types)
Research library replacements for reimplemented algorithms
description:
## Library Replacement Research

### HIGH PRIORITY REPLACEMENTS

**1. turf.js** - Would replace ~10 geometry functions:
- Point-in-polygon (ray casting) in regionMapper.ts
- Euclidean distance calculations
- Polygon area (shoelace formula)
- Polygon centroid
- Bounding box calculations

**2. simple-statistics** - Statistical functions:
- Shannon entropy (distributionCalculations.ts)
- Variance/StdDev (statisticsCollector.ts)
- Mean absolute deviation

**3. graphlib** - Graph algorithms:
- DFS for connected components (statisticsCollector.ts)
- Graph traversal utilities

**4. poisson-disk-sampling** - Spatial distribution:
- regionPlacement.ts rejection sampling

### BUGS FOUND
⚠️ **Fisher-Yates shuffle in helpers.ts uses `sort(() => Math.random() - 0.5)`** - This is NOT a proper shuffle and produces biased results. Replace with lodash.shuffle or fast-shuffle.

### NOT WORTH REPLACING (Domain-Specific)
- Weighted scoring/hub penalties in targetSelector.ts
- Homeostatic control in dynamicWeightCalculator.ts
- Greedy clustering in clusteringUtils.ts (tuned for world gen)

### SUMMARY
| Library | Functions Replaced | Files Affected |
|---------|-------------------|----------------|
| turf.js | 10+ | regionMapper.ts, regionPlacement.ts |
| simple-statistics | 5 | distributionCalculations.ts, statisticsCollector.ts |
| graphlib | 2 | statisticsCollector.ts, graphQueries.ts |
| poisson-disk-sampling | 1 | regionPlacement.ts |
| lodash/fast-shuffle | 1 | helpers.ts (BUG FIX)

title: Move loreIndex.ts and loreValidator.ts to domain
description: These files contain penguin-specific hardcoded data and should be in penguin-tales/lore/ not in framework

title: Move feedbackLoops config to domain
description: feedbackLoops in lib/config/ contains domain-specific data. Should be passed via EngineConfig from domain.

title: Remove hardcoded entity kind logic from framework
description:
The framework has hardcoded knowledge of entity kinds (npc, location, faction, etc.) in:
- worldEngine.ts: createEntitySnapshot(), detectChanges()
- changeDetection.ts: entity-kind-specific snapshot logic

**Solution:**
1. Extend EntityKindDefinition with snapshotConfig
2. Domain defines how each entity kind should be tracked
3. Framework uses domain schema to determine change detection rules

**Tasks:**
- Add snapshotConfig to EntityKindDefinition interface
- Create generic snapshot creation based on domain config
- Update penguin schema with snapshot configs for each entity kind
- Remove entity-kind-specific if/else chains from framework

title: Add snapshotConfig to EntityKindDefinition
Update penguin schema with snapshot configs
description:
In penguin-tales/lore/schema.ts, add snapshotConfig to each entity kind:

- npc: track leader_of links
- location: count resident_of, track controls/stronghold_of  
- faction: track leader_of, stronghold_of, allied_with, at_war_with
- rules: track weaponized_by, kept_secret_by
- abilities: count practitioner_of, track manifests_at

title: Phase 1: Implement core name generation framework
Complete Graph API encapsulation migration in actionDomains.ts
Move entityRegistries.ts to domain layer
description: entityRegistries.ts defines all entity kinds, subtypes, and template references. Should be domain-specific.
notes: File doesn't exist - entityRegistries.ts not found in codebase. Either removed, renamed, or was never created. Task obsolete.

title: Parameterize emergentDiscovery.ts via domain schema
description: emergentDiscovery.ts has hardcoded subtypes (colony, anomaly) and status values (thriving, waning). Parameterize via domain schema.
notes: Analysis: emergentDiscovery.ts partially parameterized. 'thrivingStatuses'/'strugglingStatuses' already come from config via requireConfigValue(). Remaining hardcoded: 'anomaly' subtype (lines 192, 309) for location entities. Fix: Add 'anomalySubtype' config field and read via requireConfigValue().

title: Remove domain-specific code from helpers.ts
notes: Analysis complete. Domain-specific functions in helpers.ts: getLocation, getFactionMembers, getFactionLeader, getCoreFactionMembers, getFactionRelationship. These are ALSO called from framework code (templateGraphView.ts, metaEntityFormation.ts) creating tight coupling. Proper fix requires: 1) Define domain interface for entity relationships, 2) Move helpers to domain layer, 3) Framework calls domain via interface. This is part of larger framework/domain separation (a3l).

title: Lint project with eslint complexity rules
description:
## Lint Results Summary

**Total issues: 216** (excluding tests)

### By Type:
- `no-explicit-any`: 66 (type safety)
- `no-unused-vars`: 49 (dead code)
- `complexity`: 44 (cyclomatic complexity > 15)
- `max-lines`: 18 (file/function too long)
- `cognitive-complexity`: 18 (Sonar metric > 15)
- `max-params`: 14 (> 4 params)

### Worst Files:
1. **worldEngine.ts** - 26 errors, 4 warnings (2400+ lines, God object)
2. **metaEntityFormation.ts** - 20 errors
3. **enrichmentService.ts** - 12 errors
4. **contractEnforcer.ts** - 10 errors
5. **helpers.ts** - 9 errors, 4 warnings

### Key Actions:
- worldEngine.ts needs major decomposition
- Many `any` types need proper typing
- Dead code cleanup (49 unused vars)
- Complex methods need extraction (checkContractEnabledBy, validateCoverage, runGrowthPhase)

title: Framework/Domain Separation: Remove penguin-specific hardcoding from lore-weave framework
description: Extract domain-specific elements from framework code

title: Move loreValidator hardcoded terms to DomainLoreProvider
Move imageGenerationService prompts to domain config
Remove createGovernanceFaction from framework metaEntityFormation.ts
description: Analysis from ti1: Framework metaEntityFormation.ts has createGovernanceFaction() creating domain-specific 'faction:political' entities. Domain already has legalCodeFormation.ts with same functionality. Remove framework version, rely on domain implementation.

title: Create domain interface for entity relationship helpers
description: Analysis from 8oh: helpers.ts has getLocation, getFactionMembers, getFactionLeader, getCoreFactionMembers, getFactionRelationship called from BOTH domain AND framework code (templateGraphView.ts, metaEntityFormation.ts). Fix: 1) Define domain interface for these operations, 2) Move implementations to domain, 3) Framework calls via interface.

title: Integrate name-forge into lore-weave framework
notes: Phase 1: Framework Changes - Create nameForgeService.ts, update addEntity(), remove old name generation. Phase 2: Domain Changes - Create config JSON, update main.ts and templates.

title: Define Zod schemas for domain configs (PhonologyProfile, MorphologyProfile, StyleRules)
Organize lore-weave lib structure
description: lib/config/tagRegistry.ts and feedbackLoops.ts contain both framework utilities (getTagMetadata, validateEntityTags, FeedbackAnalyzer) and domain-specific data (penguin tags like orca/colony/fishing, hero/conflict feedback loops). Needs split: framework keeps interfaces and utility functions, domain provides data via DomainSchema config. This is part of a3l epic.

title: Complete tags array to KVP migration in domain templates and systems
Parameterize 'anomaly' subtype in emergentDiscovery.ts
description: Analysis from 7si: emergentDiscovery.ts hardcodes 'anomaly' subtype (lines 192, 309). Add 'anomalySubtype' config field and read via requireConfigValue() like other config values.
notes: emergentDiscovery.ts contains domain-specific concepts (magic, anomalies, resource types). Moving entire file to penguin-tales domain.

title: Implement Generalized Coordinate System
description:
Implement unified 6-axis coordinate template (plane, sector_x, sector_y, cell_x, cell_y, z_band) for all entity types.

Key Design:
- Required coordinates field on HardState (not optional)
- Eager assignment - templates must assign at creation
- Physical space first - locations/NPCs
- Cross-kind distance in shared spaces

Reference: COORDINATES.md, plan at ~/.claude/plans/mellow-dancing-feather.md

title: Extract relationship config from helpers.ts to domain schema
description: helpers.ts has 400+ lines of hardcoded relationship mappings (strengths, categories, conflicts, thresholds). Move to DomainSchema.
notes: Extended DomainSchema with RelationshipConfig, RelationshipLimits, RelationshipCategory types. Updated penguin schema with strength, category, isLineage, distanceRange, conflictsWith. Updated helpers.ts to use domain schema methods with fallback.

title: Replace custom algorithms with library implementations
description:
Based on research in penguin-tales-3qn, replace custom implementations with battle-tested libraries:

1. **turf.js** - Replace geometry functions in regionMapper.ts
2. **simple-statistics** - Replace stats in distributionCalculations.ts, statisticsCollector.ts  
3. **Fix shuffle bug** - helpers.ts uses broken sort-based shuffle

Start with the shuffle bug fix (easiest, highest impact on correctness).
notes: Completed: 1) Fixed biased shuffle with Fisher-Yates, 2) Replaced variance/stdDev in statisticsCollector.ts with simple-statistics, 3) turf.js not applicable (3D coords vs 2D geo)

title: Create example domain configs and test generation
Test validation system on example domains
Move occurrence relationship kinds to domain config
description: Analysis from rgj: occurrenceCreation.ts hardcodes 'participant_in', 'epicenter_of', 'triggered_by' relationship kinds. Options: 1) Add to FRAMEWORK_RELATIONSHIP_KINDS if universal, 2) Move to domain config via graph.config.domain, 3) Move entire occurrenceCreation system to domain layer.

title: Setup world-gen-naming package structure and dependencies
Framework/Domain Separation: Define framework-level primitives
description:
Define the minimal set of primitives that the framework needs to operate:

**Framework Entity Kinds:**
- era - Required for era transition system

**Framework Relationship Kinds:**
- part_of - Hierarchical composition (meta-entities, structural)
- supersedes - Temporal succession (era transitions)
- active_during - Entity-era temporal binding

**Framework Status Values:**
- historical - Archived entity/relationship
- active - Generic active state

**Implementation:**
1. Create apps/lore-weave/lib/types/frameworkPrimitives.ts
2. Define constants and type guards
3. Update framework code to use these constants instead of string literals
4. Document which primitives are framework vs domain
notes: Completed: Converted framework code to use FRAMEWORK_ENTITY_KINDS, FRAMEWORK_STATUS, FRAMEWORK_RELATIONSHIP_KINDS constants. Updated 8 files: eraTransition.ts, eraSpawner.ts, occurrenceCreation.ts, universalCatalyst.ts, catalystHelpers.ts, worldEngine.ts, enrichmentService.ts, frameworkPrimitives.ts. Added documentation to CLAUDE.md about framework primitives. Note: Test failures pre-exist (mock graph missing methods).

title: Create frameworkPrimitives.ts with constants and type guards
Validate name-forge integration - entities not showing penguin names
Rationalize test suite
notes:
Progress: Fixed null check in templateGraphView.ts constructor.
Tests improved from 363 failing to 291 failing (945 passing).

Remaining issues:
- Test mocks use old Graph interface (direct property access vs getEntity/getRelationships methods)
- Need proper mock factory that matches current Graph API
- 18 test files still failing

Suggested fix: Create createMockGraph() helper that returns Graph with proper methods

title: Implement phonology generator (syllable templates, phoneme selection)
Extract occurrence relationship kinds to domain schema
description: occurrenceCreation.ts references domain relationship kinds (participant_in, epicenter_of, triggered_by). Move to domain config.
notes: Analysis: occurrenceCreation.ts hardcodes 'participant_in', 'epicenter_of', 'triggered_by' relationship kinds in contract and code. Options: 1) Add to FRAMEWORK_RELATIONSHIP_KINDS if universal to all domains, 2) Move to domain config and read via graph.config.domain, 3) Move entire occurrenceCreation system to domain layer. Part of larger a3l epic for framework/domain separation.

title: Remove remaining domain refs from metaEntityFormation.ts
description: metaEntityFormation.ts references domain-specific subtypes and relationship kinds. Already deprecated but cleanup needed.
notes: Found: metaEntityFormation.ts has createGovernanceFaction() creating 'faction:political' entities with hardcoded subtypes/relationships ('controls', 'weaponized_by'). Domain also has its own version in legalCodeFormation.ts. Fix: 1) Remove createGovernanceFaction from framework metaEntityFormation.ts, 2) Rely solely on domain's legalCodeFormation.ts. Controlled by config.transformation.createGovernanceFaction flag.

title: Extract action domain logic from catalystHelpers.ts
description: catalystHelpers.ts contains subtype-to-action-domain mappings and occurrence types. Move to domain config.
notes: Already done! Action domain logic properly delegated to domain: 1) Framework defines interface in domainSchema.ts (getActionDomains, getActionDomainsForEntity), 2) Domain implements in penguin-tales/lore/config/actionDomains.ts, 3) Framework reads via graph.config.domain.getActionDomainsForEntity(). No changes needed.

title: Refactor meta-entity formation to SimulationSystem pattern
description:
Convert MetaEntityFormation service to a configurable SimulationSystem pattern:

**Current Problems:**
- MetaEntityConfig has domain logic (createGovernanceFaction)
- Hardcoded clustering criteria types
- Special service instead of reusing existing system abstraction

**Solution:**
1. Create framework clustering utilities (clusterEntities, transferRelationships, archiveEntity)
2. Remove MetaEntityFormation service
3. Domain defines meta-entity systems using SimulationSystem interface
4. Move createGovernanceFaction to domain as post-formation hook or separate system

**Tasks:**
- Create apps/lore-weave/lib/utils/clusteringUtils.ts
- Create apps/lore-weave/lib/utils/entityArchival.ts
- Update penguin domain to use system pattern for magic schools, legal codes
- Remove MetaEntityFormation service and MetaEntityConfig type

title: Create clusteringUtils.ts with generic clustering functions
description:
Create apps/lore-weave/lib/utils/clusteringUtils.ts:

- clusterEntities(graph, config): Cluster[] - Generic greedy clustering
- ClusterConfig interface with similarity callback
- Cluster interface (entities, score)
- Domain provides similarity function instead of hardcoded criteria types

title: Create entityArchival.ts with archival utilities
description:
Create apps/lore-weave/lib/utils/entityArchival.ts:

- archiveEntity(graph, entityId): Mark entity as historical
- archiveRelationship(graph, src, dst, kind): Mark relationship as historical  
- transferRelationships(graph, fromIds, toId): Move relationships to new entity
- preservePartOfLinks(graph, childIds, parentId): Create part_of relationships

title: Convert magic school formation to SimulationSystem
description:
In penguin-tales/lore/systems/:

Create magicSchoolFormation.ts as a SimulationSystem that:
- Uses clusterEntities() from framework
- Defines penguin-specific similarity function
- Creates meta-entity using domain factory
- Uses framework archival utilities

Remove from metaEntityConfigs.ts

title: Convert legal code formation to SimulationSystem
description:
In penguin-tales/lore/systems/:

Create legalCodeFormation.ts as a SimulationSystem that:
- Uses clusterEntities() from framework
- Defines penguin-specific similarity function
- Creates legal code entity
- Creates governance faction (domain-specific side effect)
- Uses framework archival utilities

Remove from metaEntityConfigs.ts

title: Remove MetaEntityFormation service and MetaEntityConfig
description:
After converting to system pattern:

1. Remove apps/lore-weave/lib/services/metaEntityFormation.ts
2. Remove MetaEntityConfig from apps/lore-weave/lib/types/engine.ts
3. Remove metaEntityConfigs from EngineConfig
4. Remove checkMetaEntityFormation() from worldEngine.ts
5. Update index.ts exports
6. Remove from penguin main.ts config
